Description: Specify 0 for Graphite and 4 for Prometheus.
Performance metrics for FileNet® Content Manager components.
The hostname for the Graphite service.
The port for the Graphite service.
The interval seconds in which to query the read plugins. If set, will use the specified interval for collectd and plugins.
If set to true, disables the collectd cpu, interface, load, memory, and prometheus plugins.
The port of the collectd embedded webserver should listen on that can be scraped by using Prometheus.
